resources.string: Hello there! Welcome to Ethereum\nLet\'s start with a wallet...

Dear User, ATTENTION!

 Be sure to store the following 12 words, your seed, from the next screen securely on paper and keep them in one or two safe places.

 DO NOT make any digital copy of it!
Your seed is the key to your corresponding assets on the blockchain. Everyone who has access to this key can take the underlying assets.

 No one can recover your seed, if it is lost!

Your seed is your money!

Be responsible!
Your Wallet is now being created! :D
